1-Conver Decimal numbers to binary:

- 5  : 101
- 31 : 011111
- 112: 1110000
- 255: 11111111

2-convert Binary bumbers to Decimal

- 11110001 : 241
- 11001010 : 202
- 11111111 : 255
- 00011100 : 28

3-Convert this text to binary

- Hello  : 01001000 01100101 01101100 01101100 01101111 
- Python : 01010000 01111001 01110100 01101000 01101111 
           01101110

4-convert this binary to text

-01011001 01101111 01110101          : You
-01000100 01101001 01100100          : Did
-01000111 01101111 01101111 01100100 : Good
-01001010 01101111 01100010          : Job
